trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported> event is included in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to support compatibility with Silverlight.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported>hendelsen er inkludert i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] å støtte kompatibilitet med Silverlight.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported>

trans-unit.source: If you do not have to ensure compatibility with Silverlight, use the touch events, such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>, on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>, or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke har sikre kompatibilitet med Silverlight, bruker du hendelsene berøring eksempel <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>og <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>, på <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>, eller <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>

trans-unit.source: Use the TouchFrameEventArgs to get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint> values that are relevant to the touch event.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av TouchFrameEventArgs til å få den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>verdier som er relevante for hendelsen berøring.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>, you can get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint.Position%2A> of the touch and determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> was a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> action.
trans-unit.target: Fra den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>, du får den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint.Position%2A>for berøring og finne ut om den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>er en <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>handlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint> to get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke til <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>å hente <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>, you can determine the device <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A> and get information about the element that is touched.
trans-unit.target: Fra den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>, kan du bestemme enheten <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A>og få informasjon om elementet er endres.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: Returns the current touch point of the primary touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer gjeldende berøring punktet for den primære berøring i forhold til det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: In a set of active touch devices, the first device to be <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Activated> is the primary touch device.
trans-unit.target: Touch enheter, den første enheten er i et sett med aktive <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Activated>er den primære berøring enheten.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Activated>

trans-unit.source: For example, if two fingers are touching the screen, the first finger that is down is represented by the primary touch device.
trans-unit.target: Hvis to fingrer er berøring skjermen, er for eksempel den første fingeren er nede representert av den primære berøring enheten.

trans-unit.source: If the first finger is lifted while the second finger is still down, the primary touch device becomes `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den første fingeren er lifted mens andre finger er fortsatt nede, primære berøring enheten blir `null`.

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som definerer koordinatsystem.

trans-unit.source: To use WPF absolute coordinates, specify `relativeTo` as <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke WPF absolutte koordinater, kan du angi `relativeTo` som <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current position of the primary <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> relative to the specified element; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the primary <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> is not active.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering for primært <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> i forhold til det angitte elementet; eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis primært <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> er ikke aktiv.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection that contains the current touch point for each active touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en samling som inneholder gjeldende berøringspunkt for hver aktive berøring enhet i forhold til det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som definerer koordinatsystem.

trans-unit.source: To use WPF absolute coordinates, specify `relativeTo` as <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke WPF absolutte koordinater, kan du angi `relativeTo` som <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint"></xref> for each active <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En samling som inneholder gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint"> </xref> for hver aktiv <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er ikke implementert.

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for Silverlight compatibility.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er angitt for kompatibilitet med Silverlight.

trans-unit.source: Because of device implementation differences, it is not implemented in WPF.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke implementert i WPF på grunn av enheten implementering forskjeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time stamp for this event.
trans-unit.target: Henter tidsstempelet for denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The time stamp for this event.
trans-unit.target: Tidsstempelet for denne hendelsen.
